mapper.select: select nation || ' ('|| count(nation) ||')' as nation_count from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) group by nation

select db_name || ' ('|| count(db_name) ||')' as db_name_count from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and nation=#{nation} group by db_name

select sector || ' ('|| count(sector) ||')' as sector_count from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and db_name=#{db_name} group by sector
select name, stock_code from AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and sector=#{sector}
SELECT STOCK_CODE FROM AvailableData where stock_code not in (select stock_code from addition where id=#{id} group by stock_code) and name = #{name}
SELECT name FROM addition where id=#{id} WHERE nation=#{nation} AND db_name=#{db_name} AND sector=#{sector} AND name=#{name} AND stock_code=#{stock_code}
